reviewText: Lenny Kravitz proves to all his fans that he is the King when it comes to music. The man is amazing live, I know this from experience. This DVD pretty much sums up what Lenny is like in concert. But not only does it show what he is like live, but you also get a look inside his daily life, which is just as exciting. Lenny is 100% is own person, he doesn't take any crap from anyone, and you either love or hate him. He is sexy, confident, laid-back, and completely loveable. Even if you don't really like him, you will by the end of this DVD, it's worth every minute. And if you ever get a chance to see him in concert, please please please go, it will be the greatest night of your life. It was mine.
